name: Perpetual Sentence
description:
WEBGL IS A BIT BUGGED! PERFORMANCE ALSO LACKS A LOT. IF AT ALL POSSIBLE, USE THE DOWNLOADBLE VERSION.

"You are destined for a life-long prison sentence if you do not escape the loop that is your mind."

Step into a game that not even the developers understand.

Escape this mind bending prison by any means necessary but never let the guards see you doing anything out of the ordinary!

Eventual glitches may be fixed in the downloadable version.

- Created by 2 persons competing in the Ludum Dare 47.
